backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing invite-only mode, user approval system, user profiles with APA skill levels, and match history storage for multiple game modes (APA practice, Accepting Gifts, Straight Shot) with CRUD operations and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed features: removal of unauthorized projected score display, removal of live PPI calculation display, and fix for 9-ball revert guard condition in ApaRackScoringPanel.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, and utilities, describing authentication, game modes, scoring panels, match history, and UI layout.
frontend/docs/v48-modecard-resume-button: Documentation for version 48 change that reordered ModeCard buttons to show 'Start New Game' above 'Resume Game', clarifying that no session storage, navigation, or gameplay logic was modified.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components including sidebar, charts, and semantic tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag and title describing the app as an APA-style pool practice scorekeeper with Accepting Gifts and Straight Shot modes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes (home, game modes, history, stats, admin), ThemeProvider, AuthGate wrapper, and error boundaries with custom fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/accepting-gifts/: Table component displaying win/loss performance statistics grouped by starting ball count (2-7) for Accepting Gifts mode.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Reusable ball button component for APA scoring with four states (unscored, playerA, playerB, dead), hover colors based on active player, and locked state support.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Provides shared UI helpers for APA 9-Ball rack scoring, including ball value calculation with one-away rule logic and rack total computation ensuring 10 points per rack.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: React component for scoring individual APA 8-ball racks with ball-by-ball tracking, inning flow management, defensive shot counting, and automatic target detection for match completion.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: React component that displays a match completion summary card showing winner, skill levels, points earned/needed, defensive shots, innings, PPI, and team match points for both players.
frontend/src/components/apa/MatchupAnaly: Dropdown menu component that extracts unique opponent names from official APA matches and allows selection for matchup analysis.
Enhanced matchup analysis dropdown with practice match toggle that filters and displays head-to-head match history between a player and selected opponent, integrating with MatchupAnalysisPanel.
Panel component that aggregates and displays head-to-head statistics (wins, losses, PPI) for both official and practice APA matches between a player and specific opponent.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Form component for creating or editing official APA match records with fields for date, opponent, skill levels, scores, innings, defensive shots, and notes with validation and connection retry logic.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: React hook managing innings counter and turn flow for APA 9-Ball matches, incrementing innings when the bottom player completes their turn and preserving state across rack boundaries.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate component that enforces login and invite-only access control, showing appropriate loading states and access denial pages based on user authentication and approval status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component that handles Internet Identity authentication and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog component for creating and editing user profiles with name and APA skill level, automatically prompting new users and handling backend connection retries.
frontend/src/components/history/MatchHis: Table component displaying match history with bulk selection and deletion capabilities, showing match results, PPI/aPPI stats, and navigation to detailed match views.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header navigation, authentication status, admin controls, stats access, and footer, showing connection status while backend initializes.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: A button component that opens a confirmation dialog to delete a match, using the useDeleteMatch hook and navigating to history or calling a callback after deletion.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: A reusable alert dialog component for confirming match termination with customizable title, description, and confirm text, supporting pending and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Displays a summary card for a match with mode badge, date, and mode-specific details (APA scores, Accepting Gifts status, or Straight Shot results), with click navigation to match details.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: A card component for game mode selection that displays title, description, icon, and buttons to start a new game or resume an in-progress session if available.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Renders line charts for APA performance trends including PPI/aPPI, points scored, and defensive shots over time using unified timestamp-keyed data with custom dot shapes for differentiation.
frontend/src/components/straight-shot/St: Displays a bar chart histogram showing the frequency distribution of shot counts across Straight Shot sessions.
Renders a table summarizing Straight Shot performance by ball count, showing wins, losses, and first win date for each ball count.
Displays a composed chart with bars and trend line showing shot count over time for Straight Shot sessions, including average calculation.
frontend/src/dev/straight-shot-spot-chec: QA checklist document for manually verifying Straight Shot (20-shot game) functionality remains intact, covering session start, shot entry, save, and history viewing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Hook providing a retry mechanism that clears and refetches the cached actor query to force reconnection without page refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including match CRUD, user profiles, AG level management, and user approval workflows with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Defines the 12-level Accepting Gifts progression system (2+8 through 7+9) with helpers for level management, clamping, and computing next baseline level based on win/loss outcomes.
Manages Accepting Gifts game session state including attempt tracking, scoring logic (player vs ghost), and set progression without modifying baseline levels.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts and aggregates APA match statistics (PPI, aPPI, points, defensive shots) from both practice and official matches with robust field-level validation and null handling.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Implements APA 9-Ball equalizer system mapping skill levels (1-9) to points-to-win targets (14-75) with validation and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Defines APA 9-Ball match point conversion chart (20-point system) based on loser's skill level and points pocketed, with threshold lookup functions.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaPracticeMatchOut: Computes APA Practice match outcomes by determining the winner based on target scores, then using the loser's skill level and points pocketed to calculate match points for both players.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Defines APA 9-ball rack scoring logic with 10 points per rack, validates rack totals, and calculates PPI (points per inning) statistics for players across multiple racks.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaSkillLevelPredic: Predicts APA skill levels (1-9) based on PPI and aPPI averages using different range tables for Official APA Tab and Detailed Player Stats pages.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaExpected: Provides the official APA Expected PPI lookup table organized by win percentage buckets (10-100%) and skill levels (SL2-SL7), with functions to bucket win percentages and retrieve expected PPI values.
Derives Official APA match outcomes (win/loss/unknown) by comparing player scores against their skill-level-based target scores, with helpers to use saved or derived outcomes.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Calculates Official APA PPI (score divided by effective innings) and aPPI (adjusted PPI using expected values from win percentage tables), with context-aware computation across match history.
frontend/src/lib/history/matchHistoryRow: Builds formatted narrative strings for match history rows, displaying mode-specific details (Official APA, APA Practice, Straight Shots, Accepting Gifts) with scores and win/loss indicators.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Determines the effective match date timestamp for sorting, preferring user-entered dates for Official APA matches and falling back to system dateTime, with local timezone-aware parsing and formatting functions.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Exports buildOfficialApaMatchLog function that creates official APA match records with derived win/loss outcomes based on skill levels and scores, plus re-exports other match builders from the original file.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Contains builder functions for APA 9-ball practice matches, Accepting Gifts matches, and Straight Shot matches, computing outcomes, stats, and generating match records with player data.
frontend/src/lib/session/inProgressSessi: Provides centralized helpers for managing per-mode in-progress session state in sessionStorage, with functions to get, set, clear, and check sessions for APA Practice, Accepting Gifts, and Straight Shot modes.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsPer: Computes Accepting Gifts performance statistics grouped by starting ball count (2-7), tracking wins and losses from completed race-to-7 sets.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsSta: Computes summary statistics for Accepting Gifts mode including total sessions and rolling average of ending object ball counts from the last N sessions.
Computes official APA match statistics including win rate, average PPI (last 10 matches), and average aPPI (best 10 of last 20), sorting matches chronologically by effective timestamp.
frontend/src/lib/stats/straightShotStats: Computes comprehensive Straight Shot statistics including rolling/lifetime averages, lowest shot count, trend data, histogram data, and summary rows tracking wins/losses by ball count.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Main game page for the Accepting Gifts drill that manages game state (levels, scores, attempts), handles rack attempts, set completion, and saving matches to the backend with session persistence.
Displays the rules and instructions for the Accepting Gifts drill, explaining the 12-level progression system, match format (race to 7), and progression rules for wins/losses.
Start page for Accepting Gifts that allows users to select a starting level, displays their baseline level, handles session creation/resumption, and shows collapsible rules.
Live scoring page for APA 9-ball practice matches that tracks rack-by-rack scoring, innings, defensive shots, manages session state, and handles match completion with backend saving.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Setup page for APA practice matches where users enter player names, skill levels, handle lag selection, and can resume or start new sessions with validation for duplicate names.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Edit page for official APA match logs that loads existing match data by ID and renders the RealApaMatchForm in edit mode with pre-populated values.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Entry page for logging official APA matches after the fact (not live scoring) that renders the RealApaMatchForm in create mode.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Displays an access-denied page for invite-only apps with a button to request approval from the owner. Shows success confirmation after request is submitted.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Shows detailed information for a single match including player stats, scores, and mode-specific data (APA practice, official APA, gifts, or straight shot). Includes navigation to player aggregate stats and match editing/deletion.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Displays all matches with filtering by mode (APA, Gifts, Straight) and toggleable views (cards or table). Supports sorting by date and navigation back to home or stats.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying four mode cards (Official APA Match Log, APA Practice, Accepting Gifts, Straight Shot) with navigation to match history for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin-only page for managing user access approvals with pending/approved/rejected lists, invite-only mode toggle, and bulk rejection functionality. Redirects non-admins to home.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Shows aggregate APA statistics for a specific player including win rate, best 10 of 20 PPI/aPPI averages, and predicted skill levels. Includes matchup analysis dropdown for opponent comparisons.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx: Deployment verification page with a checklist and navigation buttons to test routing to Home and Match History pages.
frontend/src/pages/stats/StatsPage.tsx: Main statistics dashboard with tabs for official APA, straight shot, and accepting gifts stats. Displays charts, trends, and performance metrics with opponent matchup analysis and navigation to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Main game page for Straight Shot drill mode with shot counting, session persistence, and match saving functionality including retry connection logic.
Displays rules for the Straight Shot drill: clear all balls in 20 shots or fewer, with 8-ball pocketed last.
Start page for Straight Shot drill showing moving average stats, session resume/start options, and recent match history.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Extracts readable error messages from unknown error types including nested objects and Error instances.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Utility functions for normalizing and comparing player names case-insensitively.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds URL-encoded route paths for player aggregate stats pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps promises with a timeout that rejects if the operation exceeds the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural notes, known issues from build 129 (unauthorized displays, broken 9-ball revert), and pending fix requests.
